name: crudites
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
small pieces of uncooked vegetables, often served with a dip (= a cold, thick sauce) before a meal: Serve the salsa in a bowl on a large board, and arrange the crudités around it. Dips such as guacamole or hummus go well with crudites and chunks of hard cheese.
More examplesFewer examplesThis is excellent with crackers, on crusty country bread, or served as a dip with crudités.Crudites are perfect for summer nibbling, as a starter, or to offer with drinks.For a snack, he served vegetable crudités with hummus dip.
